name: DO YOUR JOB (Yarrow)
description:
>About:

Do Your Job is a survival game? job simulation?... its a think i slapped in under a month. It started off with an idea I worked on with a friend for a game jam that we didn't finish in time because of other responsibilities that I decided to extend into a more finished thing.

You are at a new job, the company is great, u love it here, everything is lovely :) People totally don't yell at you, things are absolutely not falling apart for systemic reasons, you are defiantly not over worked and most importantly you are happy!. 

In this brilliant work environment you find yourself let me tell you..

>How To Do Your Job:

Well you gotta pay attention on a few things indicated in the top left; the storage, the network use, the security filter and complaints filed by other staff about the systems. Don't let the bars fill up or numbers max out by opening up the following management applications:

  • Storage: Get rid of files and folders cluttering up the system
  • Network: Connect IPs to the right Ports or the connections drop
  • Security: Intercept malicious files before they can spread to the system and do annoying stuff like popup ads
  • Complaints: Respond to the complaint tickets by typing something out of an appropriate length and send it out otherwise people get angry

If the systems max out others relying on these systems wont be able to work and the revenue starts falling. If revenue hits zero u get axed and its game over lol. Seem like a lot? Yea... it is... anyway best of luck surviving p(o_o).

>Credits:

LordOfDreadHisHighnessHafeez - Audio Programming, Promo Video, moral support

Yarrow(Me) - Everything else

>Special Thanks :
  • Cyan for the base Blit script and Gamedevbill for their modified version.
  • Michael Ghelfi Studios for the Panicked Crowd audio.
  • Kevin MacLeod for the BGM here
  • IconPark for the Rocking Horse icon.
  • GermFood and their game Night of the Consumer for inspiration and a fun time
